alert.note: Alert for Mainland Monroe (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued December 20 at 2:25PM EST until December 23 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Key West
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Key West and Stock Island * WHEN...Until 430 PM EST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 224 PM EST, National Weather Service Meteorologist detected heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 0.2 and 0.3 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1.5 to 2 inches are expected over the next hour across the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Key West, Fleming Key, Sunset Key and Key Haven. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Do not drive your vehicle into areas where the water covers the roadway. The water depth may be too great to allow your car to cross safely.
